snippet: Do you think President Obama's endorsement will provide other members of Congress who support same-sex marriage with the political courage to officially say so? What will ultimately be the most successful course to same-sex marriage recognition?
abstract: Do you think President Obama's endorsement will provide other members of Congress who support same-sex marriage with the political courage to officially say so? What will ultimately be the most successful course to same-sex marriage recognition?

headline.main: The Most Likely Route to Same-Sex Marriage: The Courts
